snippet.title: DRIFT APOCALYPSE - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
An arcade game where you drift to survive.
How many zombies can you exterminate before the end of the world?

- DRIFT OVER ZOMBIES.
- COMPETE WITH YOUR FRIENDS TO ACHIEVE THE BEST SCORE.
- UNLOCK NEW UNIQUE VEHICLES.

DRIFT APOCALYPSE free to download:
Google Play store (Android):
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.torrydev.driftapocalypse
Itchio (PC):
https://torrydev.itch.io/
Newgrounds (Web):
https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/819117

Game made by TorryDEV (Sergi Torrella)
torrydev@gmail.com
